tool_description:
Extract articles, audio, video, image, embed code, metadata and more from websites.

Disclaimer: 
- Audio and video can only be extracted on websites using HTML5 audio or video.
- This API is not intended to be used on client-side rendered web applications.
name: Nimble Scraper
title: Nimble Scraper

api_list.name: GET extracted data
api_list.description: Returns extracted data such as publisher, image, logo, description, audio, video,  and other metadata.
